attributes.action: Make the Chanceller of the exchequer deliver his next budget speech with a stocking over his head and a stripy black and white jumper.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As each budget is by and large Daylight robbery, The chancellor should be forced to dress as a criminal

Yeah not Bad. Are you alright? YEAH IM ALRIGHT.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
